OUTLINE : This randomize , open-label , multicenter study . Patients stratify accord participate center , WHO performance status ( 0 vs 1 ) , presence metastatic disease ( yes v ) . Patients randomize one two treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients receive gemcitabine IV 30 minute day 1 , 8 , 15 cisplatin IV 1 hour day 1 2 . Treatment repeat every 28 day maximum 6 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . - Arm II : Patients receive paclitaxel IV 1 hour day 1 8 follow cisplatin IV 1 hour day 1 gemcitabine IV 30 minute day 1 8 . Treatment repeat every 21 day maximum 6 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow every 3 month 2 year every 6 month least 3 year .
